name: Yusuf Ali
text: Ta. Sin. Mim.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: These are verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It may be thou frettest thy soul with grief, that they do not become Believers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If (such) were Our Will, We could send down to them from the sky a Sign, to which they would bend their necks in humility.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But there comes not to them a newly-revealed Message from (Allah) Most Gracious, but they turn away therefrom.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They have indeed rejected (the Message): so they will know soon (enough) the truth of what they mocked at!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Do they not look at the earth,- how many noble things of all kinds We have produced therein?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily, in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily, thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, thy Lord called Moses: "Go to the people of iniquity,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "The people of the Pharaoh: will they not fear Allah?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "O my Lord! I do fear that they will charge me with falsehood:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "My breast will be straitened. And my speech may not go (smoothly): so send unto Aaron.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And (further), they have a charge of crime against me; and I fear they may slay me."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Allah said: "By no means! proceed then, both of you, with Our Signs; We are with you, and will listen (to your call).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So go forth, both of you, to Pharaoh, and say: 'We have been sent by the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Send thou with us the Children of Israel.'"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "Did we not cherish thee as a child among us, and didst thou not stay in our midst many years of thy life?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And thou didst a deed of thine which (thou knowest) thou didst, and thou art an ungrateful (wretch)!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Moses said: "I did it then, when I was in error.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So I fled from you (all) when I feared you; but my Lord has (since) invested me with judgment (and wisdom) and appointed me as one of the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And this is the favour with which thou dost reproach me,- that thou hast enslaved the Children of Israel!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Pharaoh said: "And what is the 'Lord and Cherisher of the worlds'?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "The Lord and Cherisher of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- if ye want to be quite sure."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said to those around: "Did ye not listen (to what he says)?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers from the beginning!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "Truly your messenger who has been sent to you is a veritable madman!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Lord of the East and the West, and all between! if ye only had sense!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "If thou dost put forward any god other than me, I will certainly put thee in prison!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Even if I showed you something clear (and) convincing?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "Show it then, if thou tellest the truth!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So (Moses) threw his rod, and behold, it was a serpent, plain (for all to see)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And he drew out his hand, and behold, it was white to all beholders!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said to the Chiefs around him: "This is indeed a sorcerer well-versed:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "His plan is to get you out of your land by his sorcery; then what is it ye counsel?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Keep him and his brother in suspense (for a while), and dispatch to the Cities heralds to collect-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And bring up to thee all (our) sorcerers well-versed."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So the sorcerers were got together for the appointment of a day well-known,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the people were told: "Are ye (now) assembled?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "That we may follow the sorcerers (in religion) if they win?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So when the sorcerers arrived, they said to Pharaoh: "Of course - shall we have a (suitable) reward if we win?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Yea, (and more),- for ye shall in that case be (raised to posts) nearest (to my person)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Moses said to them: "Throw ye - that which ye are about to throw!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they threw their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the might of Pharaoh, it is we who will certainly win!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then Moses threw his rod, when, behold, it straightway swallows up all the falsehoods which they fake!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then did the sorcerers fall down, prostrate in adoration,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Saying: "We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Said (Pharaoh): "Believe ye in Him before I give you permission? surely he is your leader, who has taught you sorcery! but soon shall ye know! Be sure I will cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will cause you all to die on the cross!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "No matter! for us, we shall but return to our Lord!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Only, our desire is that our Lord will forgive us our faults, that we may become foremost among the believers!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: By inspiration we told Moses: "Travel by night with my servants; for surely ye shall be pursued."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then Pharaoh sent heralds to (all) the Cities,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Saying): "These (Israelites) are but a small band,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And they are raging furiously against us;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But we are a multitude amply fore-warned."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We expelled them from gardens, springs,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Treasures, and every kind of honourable position;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thus it was, but We made the Children of Israel inheritors of such things.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they pursued them at sunrise.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And when the two bodies saw each other, the people of Moses said: "We are sure to be overtaken."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "By no means! my Lord is with me! Soon will He guide me!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then We told Moses by inspiration: "Strike the sea with thy rod." So it divided, and each separate part became like the huge, firm mass of a mountain.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We made the other party approach thither.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We delivered Moses and all who were with him;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But We drowned the others.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And rehearse to them (something of) Abraham's story.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, he said to his father and his people: "What worship ye?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "We worship idols, and we remain constantly in attendance on them."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Do they listen to you when ye call (on them)?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Or do you good or harm?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Nay, but we found our fathers doing thus (what we do)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Do ye then see whom ye have been worshipping,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Ye and your fathers before you?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "For they are enemies to me; not so the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Who created me, and it is He Who guides me;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Who gives me food and drink,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And when I am ill, it is He Who cures me;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Who will cause me to die, and then to life (again);

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And who, I hope, will forgive me my faults on the day of Judgment.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "O my Lord! bestow wisdom on me, and join me with the righteous;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Grant me honourable mention on the tongue of truth among the latest (generations);

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Forgive my father, for that he is among those astray;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And let me not be in disgrace on the Day when (men) will be raised up;-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "The Day whereon neither wealth nor sons will avail,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But only he (will prosper) that brings to Allah a sound heart;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "To the righteous, the Garden will be brought near,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And to those straying in Evil, the Fire will be placed in full view;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And it shall be said to them: 'Where are the (gods) ye worshipped-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Besides Allah? Can they help you or help themselves?'

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Then they will be thrown headlong into the (Fire),- they and those straying in Evil,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And the whole hosts of Iblis together.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "They will say there in their mutual bickerings:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'When we held you as equals with the Lord of the Worlds;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'And our seducers were only those who were steeped in guilt.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Now, then, we have none to intercede (for us),

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Nor a single friend to feel (for us).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Now if we only had a chance of return we shall truly be of those who believe!'"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in this is a Sign but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The people of Noah rejected the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, their brother Noah said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah, and obey me."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Shall we believe in thee when it is the meanest that follow thee?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "And what do I know as to what they do?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Their account is only with my Lord, if ye could (but) understand.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am not one to drive away those who believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am sent only to warn plainly in public."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "If thou desist not, O Noah! thou shalt be stoned (to death)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "O my Lord! truly my people have rejected me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Judge Thou, then, between me and them openly, and deliver me and those of the Believers who are with me."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We delivered him and those with him, in the Ark filled (with all creatures).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thereafter We drowned those who remained behind.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The 'Ad (people) rejected the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, their brother Hud said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Do ye build a landmark on every high place to amuse yourselves?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And do ye get for yourselves fine buildings in the hope of living therein (for ever)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And when ye exert your strong hand, do ye do it like men of absolute power?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Now fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Yea, fear Him Who has bestowed on you freely all that ye know.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Freely has He bestowed on you cattle and sons,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And Gardens and Springs.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "It is the same to us whether thou admonish us or be not among (our) admonishers!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "This is no other than a customary device of the ancients,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And we are not the ones to receive Pains and Penalties!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they rejected him, and We destroyed them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Thamud (people) rejected the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, their brother Salih said to them: "Will you not fear (Allah)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah, and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Will ye be left secure, in (the enjoyment of) all that ye have here?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Gardens and Springs,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And corn-fields and date-palms with spathes near breaking (with the weight of fruit)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And ye carve houses out of (rocky) mountains with great skill.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But fear Allah and obey me;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And follow not the bidding of those who are extravagant,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Who make mischief in the land, and mend not (their ways)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us: then bring us a Sign, if thou tellest the truth!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Here is a she-camel: she has a right of watering, and ye have a right of watering, (severally) on a day appointed.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Touch her not with harm, lest the Penalty of a Great Day seize you."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But they ham-strung her: then did they become full of regrets.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But the Penalty seized them. Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The people of Lut rejected the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, their brother Lut said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the lord of the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Of all the creatures in the world, will ye approach males,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And leave those whom Allah has created for you to be your mates? Nay, ye are a people transgressing (all limits)!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "If thou desist not, O Lut! thou wilt assuredly be cast out!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "I do detest your doings."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So We delivered him and his family,- all

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Except an old woman who lingered behind.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But the rest We destroyed utterly.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We rained down on them a shower (of brimstone): and evil was the shower on those who were admonished (but heeded not)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in this is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Companions of the Wood rejected the messengers.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, Shu'aib said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I am to you a messenger worthy of all trust.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So fear Allah and obey me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "No reward do I ask of you for it: my reward is only from the Lord of the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Give just measure, and cause no loss (to others by fraud).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And weigh with scales true and upright.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And withhold not things justly due to men, nor do evil in the land, working mischief.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And fear Him Who created you and (who created) the generations before (you)"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Thou art no more than a mortal like us, and indeed we think thou art a liar!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Now cause a piece of the sky to fall on us, if thou art truthful!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "My Lord knows best what ye do."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But they rejected him. Then the punishment of a day of overshadowing gloom seized them, and that was the Penalty of a Great Day.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily in that is a Sign: but most of them do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And verily thy Lord is He, the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily this is a Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: With it came down the spirit of Faith and Truth-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: To thy heart and mind, that thou mayest admonish.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In the perspicuous Arabic tongue.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Without doubt it is (announced) in the mystic Books of former peoples.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it not a Sign to them that the Learned of the Children of Israel knew it (as true)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Had We revealed it to any of the non-Arabs,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And had he recited it to them, they would not have believed in it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thus have We caused it to enter the hearts of the sinners.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They will not believe in it until they see the grievous Penalty;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But the (Penalty) will come to them of a sudden, while they perceive it not;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then they will say: "Shall we be respited?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Do they then ask for Our Penalty to be hastened on?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Seest thou? If We do let them enjoy (this life) for a few years,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Yet there comes to them at length the (Punishment) which they were promised!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It will profit them not that they enjoyed (this life)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Never did We destroy a population, but had its warners -

name: Yusuf Ali
text: By way of reminder; and We never are unjust.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: No evil ones have brought down this (Revelation):

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It would neither suit them nor would they be able (to produce it).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Indeed they have been removed far from even (a chance of) hearing it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So call not on any other god with Allah, or thou wilt be among those under the Penalty.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And admonish thy nearest kinsmen,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And lower thy wing to the Believers who follow thee.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then if they disobey thee, say: "I am free (of responsibility) for what ye do!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And put thy trust on the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Who seeth thee standing forth (in prayer),

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And thy movements among those who prostrate themselves,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: For it is He Who heareth and knoweth all things.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Shall I inform you, (O people!), on whom it is that the evil ones descend?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They descend on every lying, wicked person,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Into whose ears) they pour hearsay vanities, and most of them are liars.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the Poets,- It is those straying in Evil, who follow them:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Seest thou not that they wander distracted in every valley?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And that they say what they practise not?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Except those who believe, work righteousness, engage much in the remembrance of Allah, and defend themselves only after they are unjustly attacked. And soon will the unjust assailants know what vicissitudes their affairs will take!
